author: Michael Larabel
description: Wayfire 0.10 was released this week and its integration with the underlying wlroots rendering code has been overhauled. In turn this opens up Wayfire to having experimental support for rendering using the Vulkan API...
title: Wayfire 0.10 Wayland Compositor Brings Experimental Vulkan Rendering

author: Michael Larabel
description: The FreeBSD project on Friday published their quarterly status report to highlight all of the interesting changes for Q2'2025. Among the recent FreeBSD efforts have been on "bsd-user-4-linux" to allow FreeBSD binaries to run unmodified on Linux systems. FreeBSD is also coming up with a policy around AI/LLM usage for contributing to the project. Additionally, Sylve is taking shape as a new web-based unified system management platform for FreeBSD systems...
title: bsd-user-4-linux Lets FreeBSD Binaries Run Unmodified On Linux

author: Michael Larabel
description: Philip Rebohle working for Valve just released DXVK 2.7.1 as the newest version of this Direct3D 8 / 9 / 10 / 11 to Vulkan API translation layer. DXVK 2.7.1 enables yet more games to correctly render now with DXVK on Linux...
title: DXVK 2.7.1 Delivers Improved Performance For Some Direct3D 9 Titles

author: Michael Larabel
description: GTK 4.20 released on Friday as the newest version of this open-source toolkit aligned with the GNOME project. GTK 4.20 brings improved support for Wayland on Linux along with platform enhancements for macOS, Android, and Windows too...
title: GTK 4.20 Released With Better Wayland Support, Rendering Enhancements

author: Michael Larabel
description: KDE developers remained very busy as they closed out the month of August. In fact, this week saw a 22 year old KDE feature request finally being addressed...
title: KDE Addresses A 22 Year Old Feature Request For Its Clipboard
